/* mappers.mypage.selectSoonToExpireFoodList */
SELECT t1.MB_NO, COUNT(*)-1 AS CNT, MIN(t1.INGREDIENT_OWNED_NM) AS INGREDIENT_OWNED_NM FROM TB_INGREDIENTS_OWNED t1 WHERE 1=1 AND LENGTH(t1.INGREDIENT_OWNED_BUY_DATE) = 8 AND LENGTH(t1.INGREDIENT_OWNED_EXPIRATION_DATE) = 8 AND (t1.INGREDIENT_OWNED_EXPIRATION_DATE - DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d')) <= 3 GROUP BY t1.MB_NO
mapper.insert: /* mappers.mypage.insertUserNoticeInfo */ INSERT INTO TB_USER_NOTICE( MB_NO, USER_NOTICE_NO, USER_NOTICE_TYPE, USER_NOTICE_CONTENTS, USER_NOTICE_REGISTER_DATE, USER_NOTICE_VIEW_YN ) SELECT #{MB_NO}, IFNULL(MAX(USER_NOTICE_NO) + 1, 1), #{noticeType}, #{noticeContents}, NOW(), 'N' FROM TB_USER_NOTICE WHERE MB_NO = #{MB_NO}
mapper.select: /* mappers.mypage.selectUserNoticeInfoListByMbNo */ SELECT TUN.MB_NO, TUN.USER_NOTICE_NO, TUN.USER_NOTICE_TYPE, TUN.USER_NOTICE_CONTENTS, CASE (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') - TUN.USER_NOTICE_REGISTER_DATE) WHEN '0' THEN '오늘' ELSE DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') - TUN.USER_NOTICE_REGISTER_DATE || '일 전' END RECEIVED_DATE, TUN.USER_NOTICE_VIEW_YN, TCC.COMMON_CODE_NM FROM TB_USER_NOTICE TUN INNER JOIN TB_COMMON_CODE TCC ON TCC.COMMON_CODE_CD = TUN.USER_NOTICE_TYPE WHERE 1=1 AND TUN.MB_NO = #{mbNo} AND TCC.COMMON_CODE_GROUP_CD = '5' GROUP BY TUN.MB_NO, TUN.USER_NOTICE_NO, TUN.USER_NOTICE_TYPE, TUN.USER_NOTICE_CONTENTS, TUN.USER_NOTICE_REGISTER_DATE, TUN.USER_NOTICE_VIEW_YN, TCC.COMMON_CODE_NM
